source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_00<tab>Florimond seeks a capable adventurer to cull vermin in his stead.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_00<tab>鬼哭隊士のフロリモンは、自分の代わりに魔物駆除に参加してくれる者を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_01<tab>Owing to an injury, Florimond is unable to join his Wood Wailer comrades in a culling operation, and asks that you take his place. Make your way to Josselin's Spire and report to Aniud.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_01<tab>フロリモンの代わりに魔物駆除に参加しよう。まずはジョスラン監視哨の「アニウド」に指示を仰ごう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_02<tab>Aniud bids you put down six black bats. Make your way to the Bramble Patch and slay the creatures.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_02<tab>アニウドから、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) 2701 /var>の討伐を命じられた。茨の森にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) 2701 /var>」を6体、討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_03<tab>You have culled the black bats. Report back to Aniud at Josselin's Spire.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) 2701 /var>を駆除することができた。ジョスラン監視哨の「アニウド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_04<tab>Thanking you for your assistance, Aniud bids you bear a message to Florimond. Take yourself back to the Hawthorne Hut, where the injured Wood Wailer is convalescing.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_04<tab>冒険者のおかげで、無事、魔物の駆除作戦は完了したようだ。アニウドの伝言をホウソーン家の山塞の「フロリモン」に伝えよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_05<tab>Upon receiving his captain's message, Florimond promises to focus his energies on recovery, and not fret to no avail over how his absence may inconvenience his comrades.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_SEQ_05<tab>「監視哨のことは気にせずゆっくり休め」というアニウドの伝言を聞いて、フロリモンは落ち着いて怪我の治療に専念することにしたようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_FLORIMOND_000_000<tab>You have the look of one who has seen more than <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fair share of danger. I am Florimond, a sentry of Josselin's Spire...though you would be forgiven for imagining me a sentry of this hut, so seldom have I left it in recent days. I sustained an injury, you see, and have been out of commission for some time.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_FLORIMOND_000_000冒険者か、それなりに戦えるようだな。
俺に代わって魔物駆除に参加してくれないか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_FLORIMOND_000_001<tab>Anyway, my Wood Wailer comrades are about to commence a culling operation in the Bramble Patch, and the thought of them marching into the jaws of danger while I languish here like a coddled babe is frankly too much to bear. I realize this is sudden, but might I trouble you to take part in the operation in my stead? If you would do me this favor, seek out Captain Aniud at Josselin's Spire. He will tell you all you need to know.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_FLORIMOND_000_001俺はこのとおり、怪我をしていて戦力にならんのだ。
詳しいことは「ジョスラン監視哨」の
「アニウド」隊長に聞いてくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_ANIUD_000_010<tab>What brings you here, adventurer? Florimond's <var 1A 02 /var>replacement<var 1A 01 /var>, you say? And...you are aware of the risks? Aye, well, you do seem a capable sort.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_ANIUD_000_010何の用だ？
……そうか、フロリモンに頼まれて、
あいつの代わりに魔物駆除に参加するというのだな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_ANIUD_000_011<tab>Florimond's task was to be the slaying of six black bats in the Bramble Patch. I take it you will now see to this? Very well. I wish you the best of luck.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_ANIUD_000_011君の仕事は「茨の森」に行き、
「」を駆除すること。
6体ほど倒してもらえれば十分だ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_ANIUD_000_020<tab>So you have seen to the black bats. We couldn't have asked for a better substitute. You have my gratitude. Now, at the risk of seeming brazen, I would ask you a favor of my own. Might you bear a message to Florimond for me?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_ANIUD_000_020ご苦労だったな、冒険者。
ついでと言ってはなんだが……
フロリモンにひとつ、伝言を頼まれてくれないか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_ANIUD_000_021<tab>The lad is being overly hard on himself for his absence. Tell him that his fretting avails no one, he himself least of all. He serves the Wood Wailers best by getting back on his feet with all swiftness─and <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> requires peace of mind.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_ANIUD_000_021心配しなくていいから、ちゃんと休めと伝えてくれ。
監視哨のことを気にしてばかりでは、
治るものも治らんだろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_FLORIMOND_000_030<tab>A message...from Captain Aniud? I see... <sigh> The captain speaks true. I must say, a great weight has been lifted from my shoulders. As bade, I shall focus all my energies on recovery, the sooner to resume my duties. My thanks again, friend.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA005_00711_FLORIMOND_000_030……隊長が俺にそんなことを？
当面の問題はお前が片付けてくれたことだし、
安心して治療に専念することにするよ。
